rev.comment: added a feature introduced in ubuntu 8.04

|Will not be a Long Term Support (LTS) release.<ref>Riddell, Jonathan. [https://lists.ubuntu.com/archives/kubuntu-devel/2007-December/002066.html Kubuntu LTS], ''kubuntu-devel'' mailing list</ref> It will ship with both KDE 3.5 and [[KDE 4.0]]. This version intends to provide feature parity with GNOME-based Ubuntu.<ref>[https://wiki.kubuntu.org/KubuntuHardyCatchup Kubuntu Hardy Catchup - Ubuntu Wiki]</ref> This includes a port of system-config-printer to [[Qt_(toolkit)|Qt]] to enable printer auto-detection, easy video codec installation in [[Kaffeine]], a simple [[Compiz]] setup tool and inclusion of Bulletproof X in [[KDE Display Manager |KDM]].<ref name=riddell0124>[Back from Release Event, Printer Magic, Compiz Settings http://www.kdedevelopers.org/node/3224]</ref><ref>[http://www.kdedevelopers.org/node/3086 UDS]</ref> Adept is also rewritten for KDE 4 - the version upgrades from 2.1 to 3.<ref name=riddell0124 />
+
|Will not be a Long Term Support (LTS) release.<ref>Riddell, Jonathan. [https://lists.ubuntu.com/archives/kubuntu-devel/2007-December/002066.html Kubuntu LTS], ''kubuntu-devel'' mailing list</ref> It will ship with both KDE 3.5 and [[KDE 4.0]]. This version intends to provide feature parity with GNOME-based Ubuntu.<ref>[https://wiki.kubuntu.org/KubuntuHardyCatchup Kubuntu Hardy Catchup - Ubuntu Wiki]</ref> This includes a port of system-config-printer to [[Qt_(toolkit)|Qt]] to enable printer auto-detection, easy video codec installation in [[Kaffeine]], a simple [[Compiz]] setup tool and inclusion of Bulletproof X in [[KDE Display Manager |KDM]].<ref name=riddell0124>[Back from Release Event, Printer Magic, Compiz Settings http://www.kdedevelopers.org/node/3224]</ref><ref>[http://www.kdedevelopers.org/node/3086 UDS]</ref> Adept is also rewritten for KDE 4 - the version upgrades from 2.1 to 3.<ref name=riddell0124 />, automatic grabbing and releasing of the mouse cursor when running on a [[VMware]] virtual machine.
|----
|----
|8.10
|8.10
